titles: Impossibilities. Or, A matter of no thing, yet some thing youle finde I know in the reading, will pleasure your minde, then heare it I pray, and when you have done, you'le say that the thread is handsomely spunne. To the tune of, I sigh, I sob, &c.
author: E. F. (Edward Ford), fl. 1630?-1660.
publisher: Printed for Edward Wright, dwelling at Christs-Church gate.,
notes: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
